description: The vms inventory dashboard displays an inventory list of all vms of the selected data center and cluster.

panels.content:
###### This dashboard displays an inventory list of all virtual machines in the selected cluster.

###### **Note:** CPU Cores and Memory Size ranges must contain numeric values or Null.

panels.description: This report displays a inventory list of all virtual machines of the selected data center and cluster.

targets.rawSql:
-- IN04-1 - This query will return for the specific data center,
-- the latest VMs configurations, grouped by clusters.

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date IS NULL
            THEN 'No'
        WHEN v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date IS NOT NULL
             THEN 'Yes'
    END AS is_deleted,
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id,
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.vm_id,
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.vm_name,
    v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_name,
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.template_name,
    a.value AS os_version,
    COALESCE ( cpu_per_socket, 0 ) * COALESCE ( number_of_sockets, 0 ) AS vm_cpucores,
    CAST ( COALESCE ( memory_size_mb, 0 ) AS float ) / 1024 AS vm_memsize,
    CAST ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.create_date AS date ) AS create_date,
    CAST ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date AS date ) AS delete_date
FROM 
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms
    LEFT OUTER JOIN 
        (
           SELECT enum_type, enum_key, value
           FROM enum_translator
           WHERE language_code = 'en_US' AND enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'
        )AS a
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_configuration_history_vms.operating_system =
                a.enum_key AND a.enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'
            )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id =
                v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_id
                AND v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.history_id 
                    IN 
                        (
                            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                            FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a
                            GROUP BY a.cluster_id
                        )
            )
WHERE
    -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the user
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id 
        IN 
            (
                SELECT cluster_id
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters
                WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
            )
    -- Here we filter by the virtual machine/s chosen by the user
    AND v4_4_configuration_history_vms.vm_id IN ($vm_id)
    -- Here we filter by the OS chosen by the user
    AND operating_system IN ($vm_os)
    -- Only show vms with number of CPU cores greater than or equal to the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER ( '$cpu_lower_threshold' ) != 'null'
                THEN COALESCE ( cpu_per_socket, 0 ) * COALESCE ( number_of_sockets, 0 ) >= ($cpu_lower_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END
    -- Only show vms with number of CPU cores smaller than the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER ( '$cpu_upper_threshold' ) != 'null'
                THEN COALESCE ( cpu_per_socket, 0 ) * COALESCE ( number_of_sockets, 0 ) < ($cpu_upper_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END 
    -- Only show vms with memory size greater than or equal to the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER ( '$mem_lower_threshold' ) != 'null'
                THEN CAST ( COALESCE ( memory_size_mb, 0 ) AS float ) / 1024 >= ($mem_lower_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END 
    -- Only show vms with memory size smaller than the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER ( '$mem_upper_threshold' ) != 'null'
                THEN CAST ( COALESCE ( memory_size_mb, 0 ) AS float ) / 1024 < ($mem_upper_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END
    -- Here we get the latest vm configurations
    AND v4_4_configuration_history_vms.history_id 
        IN 
            (
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms a
                GROUP BY a.vm_id
            )
        -- Here we get or remove deleted entities according to what the user chose
        -- in the "show_deleted" parameter.
    AND
        CASE
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                THEN 1=1
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date isnull
        END
ORDER BY
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id,
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date DESC

panels.title: Virtual Machines Inventory (IN04-1)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT   
    CAST ( datacenter_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  
    CASE          
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     	    
            THEN datacenter_name 	 	
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      	    
            THEN datacenter_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  		
    END AS __text  		
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters  		
WHERE       		    
    history_id           			    
        IN               				
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters a  		         					
                GROUP BY a.datacenter_id 	         				
            ) 	 			
    AND datacenter_id  	         			    
        IN 			     				    
            ( 					 						
                SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id 					 						
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters 					 						
                WHERE  					     						    
                    cluster_id 					         						        
                        IN 					             						            
                            ( 									 										
                                SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 									 										
                                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms  								 									
                            ) 				 					
            ) 	 			
    AND 	    			    
        CASE  	        				    
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            					    
                THEN 1=1 		    					
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        					    
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters.delete_date ISNULL 	                
        END
list.label: Data Center
list.name: datacenter_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT   
    CAST ( datacenter_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  
    CASE          
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     	    
            THEN datacenter_name 	 	
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      	    
            THEN datacenter_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  		
    END AS __text  		
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters  		
WHERE       		    
    history_id           			    
        IN               				
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters a  		         					
                GROUP BY a.datacenter_id 	         				
            ) 	 			
    AND datacenter_id  	         			    
        IN 			     				    
            ( 					 						
                SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id 					 						
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters 					 						
                WHERE  					     						    
                    cluster_id 					         						        
                        IN 					             						            
                            ( 									 										
                                SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 									 										
                                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms  								 									
                            ) 				 					
            ) 	 			
    AND 	    			    
        CASE  	        				    
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            					    
                THEN 1=1 		    					
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        					    
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters.delete_date ISNULL 	                
        END

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT        
    CAST ( cluster_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  	
    CASE      	    
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     		    
            THEN cluster_name 	 		
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      		    
            THEN cluster_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  	
    END AS __text  	
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters  	
WHERE       	    
    history_id           		    
        IN               			    
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a  		         					
                GROUP BY a.cluster_id 	         				
            ) 	 		
    AND cluster_id  	         		    
        IN 			     			    
            ( 					 					
                SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 					 					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms 				 				
            ) 	 		
    AND 	    		    
        CASE  	        			    
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            				    
                THEN 1=1 		    				
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        				    
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.delete_date ISNULL 	    			
        END     		
    AND datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster_id
list.query:

    history_id           		    
        IN               			    
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )

    AND cluster_id

    AND 	    		    
        CASE  	        			    
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            				    
                THEN 1=1 		    				
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'

    AND datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)

list.label: Virtual Machine
list.name: vm_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT        
    CAST ( vm_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  	
    CASE      	    
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     		    
            THEN vm_name 	 		
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      		    
            THEN vm_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  	
    END AS __text  	
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms  	
WHERE       	    
    history_id           		    
        IN               			    
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms a  		         					
                GROUP BY a.vm_id 	         				
            ) 	 		
    AND 	    		    
        CASE  	        			    
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            				    
                THEN 1=1 		    				
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        				    
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date ISNULL 	    			
        END     		
    AND cluster_id IN ($cluster_id)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT      
    operating_system AS __value, 
    a.value AS __text    
FROM 
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms      
    LEFT OUTER JOIN     
    (          
        SELECT enum_type, enum_key, value          
        FROM enum_translator          
        WHERE 
             language_code = 'en_US' 
            AND enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'     
    ) AS a         
        ON              
        (                 
            v4_4_configuration_history_vms.operating_system =                 
            a.enum_key AND a.enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'             
        )         
WHERE       		         
    history_id           			             
        IN             
            (                 
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )                 
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms a                 
                GROUP BY a.vm_id             
            ) 	 			     
    AND vm_id IN ($vm_id)  			     
    AND         
        CASE             
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'                 
                THEN 1=1 		    					             
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'                 
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date ISNULL         
        END
list.label: OS
list.name: vm_os
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT      
    operating_system AS __value, 
    a.value AS __text    
FROM 
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms      
    LEFT OUTER JOIN     
    (          
        SELECT enum_type, enum_key, value          
        FROM enum_translator          
        WHERE 
             language_code = 'en_US' 
            AND enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'     
    ) AS a         
        ON              
        (                 
            v4_4_configuration_history_vms.operating_system =                 
            a.enum_key AND a.enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'             
        )         
WHERE       		         
    history_id           			             
        IN             
            (                 
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )                 
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms a                 
                GROUP BY a.vm_id             
            ) 	 			     
    AND vm_id IN ($vm_id)  			     
    AND         
        CASE             
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'                 
                THEN 1=1 		    					             
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'                 
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date ISNULL         
        END

title: 04 Virtual Machines Inventory Dashboard
